name: Moto Extreme Ride
description: Moto Extreme Ride is a new motorcycle game in which you will have to do your best in order to reach the end of each level without falling down. don't kill your hero and don't destroy his bike or you will have to start over. good luck!  Moto Extreme Ride is a cool little motor challenge game, where you try to help drive our motorcycle driver cross the finish line as fast as possible without tipping over or being wrecked by obstacles along the way.
